faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services

items.wordpressVsCustom: Should I choose WordPress or custom development?
items.wordpressVsCustomAnswer: WordPress is ideal for businesses that need a professional website quickly and cost-effectively, with content management capabilities. Custom development is better for unique functionality, superior performance, or when you need complete control over every aspect of your site.
items.aiContent: What is your AI-powered Japanese content writing service?
items.aiContentAnswer: Our proprietary AI system uses MeCab morphological analysis to understand Japanese language structure, identify compound nouns, and optimize for top-ranking keywords. This ensures natural, SEO-friendly Japanese content that resonates with native speakers while improving search rankings. Each article is tailored to your industry and target keywords.
items.timeline: How long does it take to build a website?
items.timelineAnswer: WordPress sites typically take 4-6 weeks, while custom development projects range from 8-12 weeks depending on complexity. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.
items.pricing: Why are prices shown as ranges?
items.pricingAnswer: Every project is unique. Our pricing ranges reflect the variety of features, pages, and complexity levels. We'll provide a fixed quote after understanding your specific requirements.
items.maintenanceAnswer: Yes, we recommend regular maintenance to keep your site secure, fast, and up-to-date. We offer monthly maintenance packages starting from ¥10,000/month.
items.seo: Is SEO included in web development?
items.seoAnswer: Basic on-page SEO setup is included in all our web development packages. For comprehensive SEO strategies and ongoing optimization, we offer dedicated SEO services.
items.multilingualAnswer: Yes! We specialize in Japanese-English bilingual sites and can implement additional languages as needed. This is especially valuable for businesses targeting international markets.
items.hostingAnswer: Yes, we offer premium hosting solutions optimized for performance and security. We can also work with your existing hosting provider if preferred.
items.paymentAnswer: We typically require 50% upfront and 50% upon project completion. For larger projects, we can arrange monthly payment plans. All prices exclude consumption tax.
